thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Changed Name of Hotel, but still as good as before
thread.title_full: Changed Name of Hotel, but still as good as before - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Colin R
title: Changed Name of Hotel, but still as good as before
text:
I stayed here for 1 night, following a night out in London with friends.
As always its a clean hotels and room.
I had a room in the basement with no windows, which is fine for me as I arrive when it is dark and I leave when it is dark. The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was fine.
Only negative comment was having a room in the basement, I heard the rumble of the underground.
Overall, good value for money.
